titleStmt.title: Two notable sermons. Made by that worthy martyr of Christ Maister Iohn Bradford, the one of repentance, and the other of the Lordes supper neuer before imprinted. Perused and allowed according to the Queenes Maiesties iniunction
titleStmt.author: Bradford, John, 1510?-1555.

titleStmt.title: Two notable sermons. Made by that worthy martyr of Christ Maister Iohn Bradford, the one of repentance, and the other of the Lordes supper neuer before imprinted. Perused and allowed according to the Queenes Maiesties iniunction
titleStmt.author: Bradford, John, 1510?-1555.
Sampson, Thomas, 1517?-1589.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Awdely, and Iohn Wyght,

notesStmt.note: The name of the editor, Thomas Sampson, appears in the heading of "To the Christian reader".
Colophon reads: Imprinted at London by Iohn Awdeley, and Iohn Wyght. The. xxx. of September. Anno Domini. 1574.
Identified as STC 3500 on UMI microfilm reel 283.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 283 and at reel 1872 (same copy filmed twice).
